H0.text: what inventions were made by ben franklin. Lightning Rod

H1.text: what inventions were made by ben franklin. Postal System Improvements

H2.text: what inventions were made by ben franklin. Franklin Stove

H3.text: what inventions were made by ben franklin. Bifocals

A4.text: Among his many creations were the lightning rod, Franklin stove, bifocal glasses and the flexible urinary catheter.

A5.text: His numerous important inventions include the lightning rod, bifocals, glass harmonica and the Franklin stove.

A6.text: Although not the first to suggest a correlation between electricity and lightning, Franklin was the first to propose a workable system for testing his hypothesis.

A7.text: The Nevyansk Tower was built 28 years before Benjamin Franklin's experiment and scientific explanation.

A8.text: The two distinguishing features of Franklin's stove were a hollow baffle (a metal panel that directed the flow of the fire's fumes) and a flue that acted as an upside-down siphon.

A9.text: This combination of events led to the first Franklin stoves being manufactured by Reading furnaces, which was owned by the local Van Leer family.
